extensionDescription.message: Right click to decode an image or canvas containing a QR code. Allows internal decoding or ZXing/MiniQR websites.

decoderSite_description.message: The site to handle QR Code decoding of right-clicked images or canvases. Note that MiniQR creates a public URL for your submitted QR.

URLHandling_description.message: How to handle URLs and text when using internal decoder

resolveURLs_description.message: Whether to automatically visit URLs when the QR code begins with http/s
